Text.Name: Gong_6_Huo
Text.Desc: The true Law of Taoist alchemy passed down from the Grand Pure One. One will not excel in miracles or battles, but uses elixirs to facilitate the cultivation progress toward excellency. It leads its followers through nine states. Reaching the final state can lead to the ultimate ascension toward immortality.
Text.SelectDesc: One will excel in alchemy, and each Breakthrough will need the help of elixirs. Are you sure you want to follow this Law?
Text.Stages.0.Necks.0.Desc: [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low Perception.[/color]
Text.Stages.1.Necks.0.Desc: [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low Perception.[/color]
Text.Stages.2.Necks.0.Desc: [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low Perception.[/color]
Text.Stages.4.Necks.0.Desc: [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough can be completed after repeated attempts. \nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low perception.[/color]
Text.Stages.5.Necks.0.Desc: [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough can be completed after repeated attempts. \nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low perception.[/color]
Text.Stages.6.Necks.0.Desc: [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough can be completed after repeated attempts. \nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low perception.[/color]
Text.Stages.7.Necks.0.Desc: Through the sea of melancholia, enlighten one's spirit with the blessing of heaven. One will face the Heavenly Tribulation after breaking this limit.
